choices: His RA Jessica coming in for an inspection
His Friends Mary and Hannah who he had agreed to hangout with
His soccer teamate Natalie who gave him a ride to the games
1.content:
Ben wakes up on a beautiful Saturday morning, his short black hair like a nest ontop of his head. Ben is a tall quiet kid, his pale complextion and meak demeanor tend to give off the impression that he is always tired. He gets out of bed excited to hangout with his friends on a weekend with no painting, art history, or design classes to worry about.

However this morning wasn't like other mornings, things were about to get really strange for Ben as his stomach suddenly started to churn. "Stupid meal plan," he grumbled to himself. Ben did live off of the schools food plan, but he often found it to be gross and has gotten a stomach bug from time to time.

He didn't think it to be odd at first, walking into the middle of his single dorm room, but the feeling in his stomach started to spread to his whole body, and he passed out on the floor. When he awoke everything was different, his surroundings had grown to unbelievable sizes. He heard massive banging as tremors soaked the ground which sounded like footsteps from outside in the hallway.

He realized in that moment that things hadn't grown, but infact that he had shrunk.

Who is outside?
1.title: Beginning

choices: jump on her cleats to get her attention
jump on her shinguards to get her attention
jump in her bag and go to the game with her
run away deciding she's not the person to help
13.content:
Ben was part of an intramural soccer team at the college because he thought it would be a great way to make friends, he wasn't very good at sports in general and this was just something to do on the weekends to stay active seeing as he was an art history major and did a lot of sitting and reading. Every Saturday his teammate Natalie who he had befriended the first practice gave him a ride in her jeep to the field.

Ben just remembered that it was game day.

The banging and earth tremors stopped outside his door and a gigantic Natalie burst into the room. Natalie was tan and had an athletic build and slim figure with long brown hair tied back in a ponytail. She had full lips and beautiful blue eyes and as great as an athlete as she was, she could sometimes be a total airhead, which wasn't boading well for your current predicament.

"Huh, guess Ben forgot to lock his door," said Natalie strolling into your room. She was in generic Nike athletic wear with long soccer socks rolled down to her ankles, yet to put on her cleats and shin guards.

"Looks like Bens not here," she said aloud realizing the rooms emptiness, "well I guess I'll just get ready here and head to the game, Ben must have gone on a pregame jog to the field or something."

You need to get her attention before she leaves do you...
13.title: His soccer teammate Natalie

14.content:
The banging gets very loud and then passes by and fades away. You exhale a sigh of relief, not knowing how you would have dealt with someone entering your room with the state that you're in. But you need to do something about your current predicament. Taking a few moments to calm yourself down and come to terms with your situation, you realize you must leave but where too?

The dining hall is an option, considering that weird food they serve is the only lead you have as to figuring out why you shrank. On the downside its breakfast time and there would be a lot of people there.

You could go to Urgent Care, but those people never really help with much, and they might do weird medical experiments on you.

You could go across campus to a classroom and find a trusted professor, but that's a lot of walking and there's a high potential of being stepped on, our caught.

Maybe a friends dorm, but who?
14.title: Just a passerby

144.content:
You exit your dorm and go into the hallway, deciding that you should go to one of your friends dorms, but who?

There was Sarah, one of your closest friends who is dating your best friend, Sarah is someone you trust a lot of secrets too. A beautiful tall ginger model, she can be kind and caring but also a little forgetful.

There was Elaine, a short beautiful girl with piercing eyes and blond hair, she loved sleeping and smoking weed just as much as she cares for her friends.

Or while you were making your choice, your weird neighbor, Emily, grabbed you off of the hallway floor.
144.title: Friends dorm

choices: She spots you on the ground
She spots a bug on the ground
She steps on you with her bare feet
15.content:
The banging stops in front of his door and he sees the handle turn and the door swing wide open. In steps Molly, a pale, short, frail looking girl with short brown hair that falls just above her shoulders. She has hazel eyes and a few piercings on her ears, nose and belly button. Molly is wearing a plain white crop top, showing off her exotic belly jewelry, with blue booty shorts and pink flip flops that she immediately kicks off when entering your room revealing the dirt caked bottoms of her feet. She had a bag over her shoulder that reeked of marijuana.

"Yo Ben, where are you?" she asks shutting the door behind her. and placing the spare key you had given her on the stand next to your bed.

"Shit," you exlaimed aloud to yourself, you had totally forgotten about giving her that. You too met sometime in early first semester, her sense of humor and laid back personality made you feel at ease and you value her as a friend. You even find yourself attracted to her at times.

She begins looking around the dorm room for signs of life, talking a few steps closer to you and then...
15.title: His weed dealer Molly

choices: Bite her to make her realize its not a dream
151.content:
Mollys eyes fall directly onto you jumping and waiving on the ground in front of her in frantic attempts to get her attention. She kneels down directly above you in order to get a real good look at the tiny creature before her. She makes out limbs and a head and eventually realizes that this tiny thing is a shrunken human, more specifically her shrunken friend Ben.

"Ben? Holy shit bro, is that you?" she exclaims, reaching down and lifting you off the ground between two of her massive fingers. "This is crazy I must be dreaming....and if I'm dreaming I can do whatever the hell I want with you little dude."

Oh no. That is the last thing you wanted to hear, there has to be a way to make Molly realize this isn't a dream. You began to wiggle and struggle between her fingers, panic mode in full effect.

"I think I will....."
151.title: She spots you on the ground

choices: you fall in and are digested
1511.content:
"I think i'm just gunna eat you little dude, your gunna be my fuckin breakfast snack!" says Molly with a devilish grin in her eyes. She begins to seductively lick her lips as she inches you closer to her maw.

"What?! No, Molly DON'T!!!!" you shout and scream and kick but you're not going anywhere and you're not going to stop Mollys lustful hunger.

"Awww, why are you fighting it little Ben? Are you scared of becoming my food? Scared of being digested inside of my tummy?" she asks playfully patting her stomach while she mocks you. "Good, you should be, Hahahaha!"

She laughs as she dangles you over her mouth witch is open wide and eagerly awaiting its delectable prize.

Then...
1511.title: Eat you

15111.content:
She lets go of you, with your helpless body dangling above her wide open maw. Your body plummets downward towards its doom. Unfortunately, or fortunately for you depending on how you viewed it, Molly's aim was a little off and your head smashes against her two front teeth, completely snapping your neck and killing you instantly. Your limp and lifeless corpse landed on her moist tongue, and is pushed toward the molars were Molly bites down mashing and crunching your body into a delicious mush that coats her tongue and fills her taste buds with delectable flavor. She savors the moment for a while mixing your mush in with her saliva, a few shards of bone getting lodged between her teeth before she finally swallows you down her throat and into the pit that is her stomach.

Satisfied and very turned on by the though of her former customer and friend's remains swimming around inside of her, she shuts the door to your room, lies down on your bed and begins to pleasure herself. She finishes on your bed not at all bothered to clean it, after all you wouldn't be needing it anymore. After cleaning herself up, she raids your room taking your money, clothes, posters, books, anything she felt like taking. Molly even found this necklace that your mom had given to you as a good luck charm, that she could use as anal beads.

The next morning after getting super fucked up at a party last night, a hungover Molly uses the rest room and relieves herself of Bens remains. It felt amazing and remembering who it was, she takes a picture of the shit so that she will always have a memory of the time she ate Ben.
15111.title: you fall in and are digested

154.content:
She continues strolling into your room and before you react to what's happening its too late, her supermassive bare foot is towering over you, descending upon your insignificant body. You watch, frozen in time as her dirt caked foot slams brutally into your body squashing you between her soles and the cold hard floor. Your body is pulverized into mush as the weight of her body shatters and flattens your bones and smushes your internal organs into a paste that smears partially on the floor and partially adds to the layer of dirt on her foot.

"Oops, I think I stepped on something."
154.title: She steps on you with her bare feet

info.brief_description: Ben is a freshman who is shrunk in his dorm! Will he find help or be crushed?
info.description:
You play as College freshman Ben Williams, who is shrunken in his dorm.

Feel free to add chapters but checkout the rules first.

Rules:
No giant guys, giant girls only
Ben can die at anytime, but try to leave an option to continue a storyline
please write more then one or two sentences in an entry

thanks!
